com.justai.zenbox.sdk.listener

Interface SpeechToTextListener


  • public interface SpeechToTextListener
    The SpeechToTextListener interface provides methods for managing the lifecycle of SpeechToText. These methods will be invoked by SpeechToText service on the main thread of your application.
    See Also:
    SpeechToText

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBeginningOfSpeech()
      Called when the user begins to speak.
      void onEndOfSpeech()
      Called when the user has ended to speak.
      void onReadyForSpeech()
      Called when SpeechToText service has connected successfully and ready to listen a speech.
      void onRecognitionError(java.lang.String error)
      Called when some recognition error occurred during a recognition process.
      void onSoundLevelChanged(int level)
      Called when the microphone's sound level is changed during listening.
      void onSpeechPartialResult(java.lang.String text)
      Called when SpeechToText service has recognised a new portion of speech and continues listening.
      void onSpeechResult(java.lang.String text)
      Called when SpeechToText service has finally recognised a speech and stops recognition process.

    • Method Detail

      • onReadyForSpeech

        void onReadyForSpeech()
        Called when SpeechToText service has connected successfully and ready to listen a speech.

      • onBeginningOfSpeech

        void onBeginningOfSpeech()
        Called when the user begins to speak.

      • onEndOfSpeech

        void onEndOfSpeech()
        Called when the user has ended to speak.

      • onSpeechPartialResult

        void onSpeechPartialResult(java.lang.String text)
        Called when SpeechToText service has recognised a new portion of speech and continues listening.
        Parameters:
        text - a partial recognition result.

      • onSpeechResult

        void onSpeechResult(java.lang.String text)
        Called when SpeechToText service has finally recognised a speech and stops recognition process.
        Parameters:
        text - the result of recognition.

      • onRecognitionError

        void onRecognitionError(java.lang.String error)
        Called when some recognition error occurred during a recognition process. SpeechToText service stops listening in such case.
        Parameters:
        error - a error message.

      • onSoundLevelChanged

        void onSoundLevelChanged(int level)
        Called when the microphone's sound level is changed during listening.
        Parameters:
        level - sound level in dB.
